articles.author: Paul Wiseman
articles.title: U.S. job openings barely budged in October, coming in just below 7.7 million - AP News
articles.description: U.S. job openings barely budged in October, coming in at 7.7 million amid uncertainty over the direction of the American economy. The Labor Department reported Tuesday that employers posted 7.67 million vacancies in October, close to September’s 7.66 million.…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) U.S. job openings barely budged in October, coming in at 7.7 million with ongoing uncertainty over the direction of the American economy.
